title: Pumpkin Icon
body: How long does it take for the pumpkin icon to show up for me? I gifted my friend a champ today and haven't gotten the icon yet.

replies.body:
We're sending the icons out over time and you should receive it no later than *November 17th.*

If you don't have anything by then, hit us up in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
I gifted a friend the icon on October 20, and I still haven't got it :/
The Teemoing icons can take up to 2 weeks after November 3rd to be added to your account.
